description: APIServerAdmissionWebhookCredentialsTokenProjection configures Service Account Volume Projection to be used for the APIServer Admission Webhook credentials

audience.description: Audience contains the intended audience of the token. A recipient of the token must identify itself with an identifier specified in the audience of the token, and otherwise should reject the token. Defaults to 'validating-webhook' / 'mutating-webhook'

enabled.description: Enabled configures if Service Account Volume Projection is used

expirationSeconds.description: ExpirationSeconds is the expected duration of validity of the service account token Defaults to 3600
